Tunable.name: client_only
Tunable.description: If checked, this layer is loaded as a client side layer. All objects on the layer will exist as scene models only and have no gameplay (e.g. no interactions, no footprint). This is useful for layers that are purely decorative. And unlike regular game objects, client side objects can be placed outside of routable/interactable areas, e.g. decorative cards in the distance. We do not support mixing game objects and client only objects on the same layer. Please separate them out onto their on layers.

TunableVariant.name: fade_data
TunableVariant.description: If enabled, the conditional layer will fade in rather than pop.

Tunable.name: delay_max
Tunable.description: The maximum length of the fade delay in sim minutes.

Tunable.name: delay_min
Tunable.description: The minimum length of the fade delay in sim minutes.

Tunable.name: fade_duration
Tunable.description: The duration of the fade in sim minutes.

Tunable.name: layer_name
Tunable.description: The name of the layer that will be loaded. World Building should tell you what this should be.
